name: Drawer setWidth
code:
LinearLayout _nav_view = (LinearLayout) findViewById(R.id._nav_view);  androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout .LayoutParams params = (androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout .LayoutParams)_nav_view.getLayoutParams();  params.width = (int)getDip((int)%s);  params.height = androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout .LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT;  _nav_view.setLayoutParams(params);
 _nav_view.setBackgroundDrawable(new android.graphics.drawable.ColorDrawable(Color.TRANSPARENT));
